rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area with large windows for natural light and view, aligning with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom with attached walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom with ample natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with access to private balcony.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Seating arrangement that fosters family bonding.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped kitchen with modern appliances, designed per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Service/Utility Room
rooms.description: For storage and additional utility needs.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated living area and bedroom for domestic help.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Grand entrance aligning with Vastu principles and local building norms.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Balconies providing ventilation and natural light.

notes: The main entrance is located in the northeast corner to invite positivity.
Living areas and dining spaces are placed towards the east and north for prosperity.
Bedrooms are positioned according to family hierarchy with master bedroom in the northeast.
Garage is set in the northwest to maintain energy flow.

building_norms: All dimensions conform to local safety codes and accessibility standards.
Materials selected meet environmental sustainability and durability criteria.
Open spaces are designed to ensure proper ventilation, natural lighting and emergency exits in accordance with Indian building regulations.
